project.title: Vikings Ultimate Reality Experience
project.description: VIKINGS ULTIMATE REALITY EXPERIENCE - Get a 3D look at the Vikings cast of characters. Built to complement the mobile app, users can view 3d rotations of the characters and view videos that reveal more about the characters.
project.roles: Animation Flash Development Created with BPG

project.title: At The Heart of Otis
project.description: At The Heart Of Otis - An interactive call to raise funds for the school. Users could share their stories about the faculty and their school experience. Concepted and executed in collaboaration with pprwrkstudio.com
project.roles: Social Concept Animation Full Development Social Media Integration

project.title: Black Swan I Just Want To Be Perfect
project.description: I Just Want To Be Perfect - A fractured video grid that was set to release clips as the release date came closer. Users could share each video on facebook and twitter. Type ROTHBART while viewing the site and get an easter egg video.
project.roles: Concepting Video Editing Full Development Facebook Integration

project.title: Harold and Kumar’s Sh*tty Upload Feature
project.description: HAROLD AND KUMAR UPLOAD FEATURE - Complete with talking Wafflebot users upload an image into a poster and add their name in 3d text. Save the image by downloading, printing or posting to facebook.
project.roles: Animation Full Development Facebook Integration 3D Text

project.title: Like Crazy Twitter Feature
project.description: Like Crazy Twitter Feature - Users completed the phrase I ___ you, #LikeCrazy. Submissions were then sized and displayed based on popularity. Twitter feeds of the director and the public feed of the hash tag were also pulled into the site.

project.title: Two Ways Through Life
project.description: Two Ways Through Life - Explore the amazing cinematography of “The Tree of Life”. Users could comment on each of the clips as well as share on their social media accounts.
project.roles: Lead Development Social Media Integration Backend Integration

project.title: Crazy Heart - The Weary Kind Video Wall
project.description: Crazy Heart video wall - Users performed a cover of the Award winning song "The Weary Kind" and submitted their youtube video to the wall. The engine for this feature was used two more times after this feature was such a success.
project.roles: Concepting Full Development YouTube API Integration Backend Integration

project.title: Splice Creature Creator
project.description: Splice Creature Creator - Users were given the opportunity to play god and create a unique creature by using dna from 5 different types of animals. Using an engine developed for a previous project made this feature a simple task.

project.title: 127 Hours Movie Site
project.description: 127 Hours Website - This site includes a unique gallery section where we split the gallery into two different areas one with movie stills and the other set photography of the Utah scenery. Users could experience both gallerys at the same time.

project.title: Next ESP Game
project.description: ESP Test - Users were challenged to guess the correct symbols on the cards. The result was a score and a sharable ineractive badge they could post on their social media wall.
project.roles: Animation Full Development Social Media Integration

project.title: Notorious Movie Site & Feature
project.description: Notorious Movie Site - Included a feature that displayed videos and songs using the youtube api, allowing users to explore the world of hip hop and its influences.
project.roles: Animation Full Development YouTube API Integration

project.title: Baby Mama Movie Site
project.description: Baby Mama Movie Site - This site includes many secret easter eggs. How many can you find?

project.title: slusho.jp
project.description: slusho.jp - A viral site for the Cloverfield Movie campaign. This site was constantly adjusted, edited and added to. The site framework I had developed was really put to the test and passed with flying colors.

project.title: MORE WORK: GREEN LANTERN LUXTYPO CAR TOWN
Contact Info
project.description: David Caneso - Currently freelancing at BPG Advertising, and has developed many award winning interactive apps, campaigns and games for the entertainment industry.
